columns.name: EVT_ISSTYPE
columns.description: if filled then variable else fixed default f

columns.name: EVT_ROUTE
columns.description: new routing code not yet used

columns.name: EVT_DEPEND
columns.description: filled job cannot be compl. unless

columns.name: EVT_METERREADING
columns.description: meter reading at which planned preventive maintenance job is due.

columns.name: EVT_ROUTEDFROM
columns.description: username of screener who routed this job.

columns.name: EVT_ROUTEREASON
columns.description: comments describing why job was rerouted.

columns.name: EVT_WARRANTY
columns.description: value is + if work is warranty related.

columns.name: EVT_OKWINEND
columns.description: end date of ok window of ppm job.

columns.name: EVT_NEARWINSTART
columns.description: start date of near window of ppm job.

columns.name: EVT_GENWINSTART
columns.description: start date of release window of ppm job.

columns.name: EVT_OKWINENDVAL
columns.description: reading at which ok window of ppm job ends.

columns.name: EVT_NEARWINBEGVAL
columns.description: reading at which near window of ppm job starts.

columns.name: EVT_GENWINBEGVAL
columns.description: reading at which release window of ppm job starts.

columns.name: EVT_ROUTESTATUS
columns.description: status of route of which this job is part (user code).

columns.name: EVT_ROUTERSTATUS
columns.description: status of route of which this job is part (system code).

columns.name: EVT_DOWNTIMEHRS
columns.description: the number of hours obj was down

columns.name: EVT_TRANSORGID
columns.description: tracking transaction number of original transaction.

columns.name: EVT_TRANSCODE
columns.description: tracking transaction code (user code, see entity tktp).

columns.name: EVT_PPOPK
columns.description: the link to the ppm objects table ( r5ppmobjects ).

columns.name: EVT_MASTERCAL
columns.description: checked to display job on master calendar

columns.name: EVT_STEP
columns.description: order of child job compared to other child jobs

columns.name: EVT_SEQ
columns.description: sub-order of child job compared to other child jobs

columns.name: EVT_OLDRSTATUS
columns.description: r status to change from when triggering event closed (system)

columns.name: EVT_OLDSTATUS
columns.description: status to change from when triggering event closed

columns.name: EVT_NEWRSTATUS
columns.description: r status to change to when triggering event closed (system)

columns.name: EVT_NEWSTATUS
columns.description: status to change to when triggering event closed

columns.name: EVT_CONFLICT
columns.description: conflict flag as determined on master calendar

columns.name: EVT_CONFLICTRESOLVED
columns.description: resolved flag as determined on master calendar

columns.name: EVT_PACKAGE
columns.description: work package code associated to this job

columns.name: EVT_UPDATECOUNT
columns.description: number of times this record has been updated

columns.name: EVT_SERVICEREQUEST
columns.description: The service request code related to the job.

columns.name: EVT_PRINT
columns.description: Whether a job should be printed

columns.description: Whether the Work Order is to be billed back to the customer or not

columns.name: EVT_ROUTEPARENT
columns.description: The job number of the route parent.

columns.description: The date the equipment of the work order was last calibrated.

columns.description: The date from which the calibration Standard Operating Procedure was effective

columns.description: The calibration status. P for Pass, F for Fail, PF for Pass, fail exists, PR for Pass, recal exists or I for

columns.description: The Standard Operating Procedure used while calibrating

columns.name: EVT_FIRSTBILL
columns.description: The first bill on which this event appeared.

columns.description: Column for Date of GL Transfer

columns.description: The user who last reviewed the calibration

columns.description: The last time the calibration was performed

columns.description: The last time the calibration was reviewed
